Configure an event set as a macro

1 On the Workstation menu, click Event Sets and Macros.

In the Available Event Sets box, select and event set.

2 Click Next >.

3 If you want the macro to allow users to enter a date and time for the events, click Prompt for date/time when running macro.

4 You can configure the macro to perform an action after inserting the events:

To apply a screen layout, click Apply screen layout and select a predefined screen layout from the list.

To execute a command, click Execute command and select a command from the list. (Note: commands are only executed if they also appear on the corresponding menu. See Menu Commands and Toolbar Buttons.)

5 Click Save.

6 When you are finished creating event sets and macros, click Close.
